
### close  {.smaller}


```
int close(int fd);

```
 

* close the file descriptor, deallocating that array index 

   * does not affect other file descriptors <br> that refer to same ‘‘open file description’’
   * (e.g. in <code>fork()</code>ed child or created via (later) <code>dup2</code>)

* if last file descriptor for open file description, resources deallocated 
<hr class="vspace" />
* returns 0 on success
* returns -1 on error 

   * e.g. ran out of disk space while finishing saving file
